name: Gravity Control (itch) (Glitchy)
description:
A game about changing the gravity to proceed. Make your way through all the levels.

Inspired by the Style of "Will You Snail?" (https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/will-you-snail)

Music by Fez Sounds: www.youtube.com/watch?v=2JmgTveNKu0

For the GMTK GameJam 2021
